video.title: Xiaolin Chronicles
video.synopsis: When Chase Young and the Shadow plot to send the universe into darkness, it's up to the Xiaolin Monks, with newcomer Ping Pong, to save the day.

episodes.synopsis: Newly promoted to Shoku warriors, the monks take on eager young Ping Pong and lovely but mysterious Willow as rival potential apprentices.
episodes.title: A New Monk in Town: Part I

episodes.synopsis: Willow and Ping Pong compete to see who will become the new Shaolin apprentice, but questions soon arise about Willow's loyalty.
episodes.title: A Girl Named Willow: Part II

episodes.synopsis: Kimiko discovers Willow's true identity while Chase abducts Ping Pong and lays waste to the temple, forcing the monks to seek a new home.
episodes.title: The Fall of Xiaolin: Part III

episodes.synopsis: With the fate of a village hanging in the balance, the monks must acquire a mystical Golden Bunny talisman without provoking its vicious guardians.
episodes.title: Buddy Blue Ray and the Golden Bunnies

episodes.synopsis: Raimundo endangers the monks' mission when he falls under the silver-tongued sway of a dangerous shape-shifting criminal.
episodes.title: Xiaolin Redemption

episodes.synopsis: The monks and the minions of Heylin must band together when Jack inadvertently threatens to distort the ecological balance of the entire world.
episodes.title: Laws of Nature

episodes.synopsis: When Jack gains control of Digital Tokyo, a virtual world created by Kimiko's father, the monks leap into action to thwart his plans.
episodes.title: Tokyo Madness

episodes.synopsis: When Chase cleverly ensnares Ping Pong in his own mind, the monks journey into the youth's brain to battle with Shadow and save the lad.
episodes.title: Out of Ping Pong's Mind

episodes.synopsis: Following Clay to Texas, the monks find a magical stallion and also tangle with Jack, who plans to use cattle in a nefarious scientific experiment.
episodes.title: Magic Stallion and the Wild Wild West

episodes.synopsis: After Chase attacks and turns all the other monks into cat warriors, Omi journeys back in time to seek Grand Master Dashi's help.
episodes.title: Princess Kaila of the Thousand Layer Mountain

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to use the monks' deepest fears against them, Chase takes control of a magical tree that protects the new Shaolin temple.
episodes.title: Mi Temple Mi Casa

episodes.synopsis: Kimiko gets a surprise when her shadowy sister, Tigress, arrives unannounced, and a bigger shock when one of the Shen Gong Wu suddenly goes missing.
episodes.title: Tigress Woo

episodes.synopsis: When Ping Pong tries to ease his workload by replicating himself with a magic ring, Chase spies an opportunity to turn him to the dark side.
episodes.title: Heylin Within

episodes.synopsis: Through a bizarre mishap, Jack turns into Good Jack -- a motivational speaker and cult figure -- and a dejected Dojo becomes his true believer.
episodes.title: Heal Me

episodes.synopsis: Dojo goes ballistic when he learns that his estranged childhood pal is wooing Master Fung. Meanwhile, Chase and Shadow unleash a dangerous beast.
episodes.title: Rocco

episodes.synopsis: When a dark talisman resurfaces in a dangerous land, Omi ignores advice and insists on going after the object, leading to dire consequences.
episodes.title: The Mask of the Green Monkey

episodes.synopsis: When Dojo vanishes, the monks travel through time to rescue him and find he has become the king of a planet where dragons rule over their human pets.
episodes.title: Planet of the Dragons

episodes.synopsis: When a cow-costumed hero vying with the monks for Shen Gong Wu turns out to be Clay's jealous younger brother, a common enemy brings them together.
episodes.title: Super Cow Patty

episodes.synopsis: Chase is accidentally exposed to a toxic serum that causes him to literally lay an egg, which Omi and Jack believe is a powerful Shen Gong Wu.
episodes.title: Chase Lays an Egg

episodes.synopsis: Tiny Sim, an evil artist and Jack’s biggest fan, brings horrible weasel drawings to life with the aid of a Shen Gong Wu.
episodes.title: Drawn to Be Evil

episodes.synopsis: The monks spring into action to save Christmas when Jack commandeers the holiday and attempts to turn it into "Jackmas."
episodes.title: Omi Saves a Holiday

episodes.synopsis: When Master Fung mysteriously begins to shrink in size, the monks must find a way to return him to his full stature before he shrivels to nothingness.
episodes.title: Who Shrunk Master Fung?

episodes.synopsis: Wuya uses Jack and the monks to steal the Shen Gong Wu she needs to get her body back, but when her plan unravels, Shadow secretly helps her.
episodes.title: Back in the Flesh Again

episodes.synopsis: Kimiko sees a mystical vision, but no one will believe her. Following her dragon-sense, she discovers the missing Dojo -- and Chase’s evil plans.
episodes.title: The Call of the Dragon: Part I

episodes.synopsis: The monks and Jack track down Kimiko, who tries to bond with a dragon. Meanwhile, Chase turns into a vengeful dragon and unleashes havoc on Xiaolin.
episodes.title: The Mark of the Dragon Spirit: Part II

episodes.synopsis: Now bonded with her dragon, Kimiko teams up with a jealous Omi to awaken the hidden Cosmic Dragon before Chase plunges the universe into darkness.
episodes.title: Fly the Dragon: Part III
